SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.t2.fcads
Class FipsWrapper

java.lang.Object
  com.t2.fcads.FipsWrapper

public class FipsWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
scoleman This is the official JAVA wrapper for the wrapper.c native function FIPSmode(). Besides this, This wrapper is the gateway for all t2Crypto (Lost password implementation) functionality

doSetVerboseLogging

public int doSetVerboseLogging(boolean vb)
Sets verbose logging level. Logs all generated and saved key data and encryption/decryption info

Parameters:
vb - true for verboase logging

doIsInitialized

public int doIsInitialized()
Checks to see if t2Cryto has been previously initialized

Returns:
1 if initialized, 0 if not

doPrepare

public void doPrepare(boolean useTestVectors)
Tells t2Cyrpto whether to use test vectors or random bytes for key/salt generation if

Parameters:
useTestVectors - True to use test vectors, false to use randomy generated key/salt

doInitializeLogin

public int doInitializeLogin(java.lang.String pin,
                             java.lang.String answers)
Performs initialization and login using pin and answers This will set up the encrypted Master Key and Backup Key and save them to NVM

Parameters:
pin - User supplied pin
answers - user supplied recovery answers (concatenated into one string)
Returns:
T2Success or T2Error

doGetDatabaseKeyUsingPin

public java.lang.String doGetDatabaseKeyUsingPin(java.lang.String pin)
Retrieves database key (to use in SqlCipher) using PIN to authenticate

Parameters:
pin - Pin to authenticate with
Returns:
Database key

doCheckAnswers

public int doCheckAnswers(java.lang.String answers)
Checks to see if the answers give and the same answers used to initialize t2Cypto

Parameters:
answers - Answers to check
Returns:
T2Success if answers are correct or T2Error if not

doCheckPin

public int doCheckPin(java.lang.String pin)
Checks pin or password to see if it matches the latest pin or password set

Parameters:
pin - Pin to check
Returns:
T2Success if pin is correct or T2Error if not

doDeInitializeLogin

public void doDeInitializeLogin()
Clears all login data

doChangePinUsingPin

public int doChangePinUsingPin(java.lang.String oldPin,
                               java.lang.String newPin)
Changes to a new PIN using the previous PIN to authenticate Generates and saves new masterKey

Parameters:
oldPin - Previous (current) pin
newPin - New pin
Returns:
T2Success or T2Error

doChangePinUsingAnswers

public int doChangePinUsingAnswers(java.lang.String newPin,
                                   java.lang.String answers)
Changes to a new PIN using ANSWERS to authenticate Generates and saves new backup key

Parameters:
newPin - New pin
answers - Answers used to initialize t2Ctrypto
Returns:
T2Success or T2Error

doFIPSmode

public int doFIPSmode()
calls the native function FIPSmode

Returns:
return value from jni FIPSmode 1 = success

doT2FIPSVersion

public java.lang.String doT2FIPSVersion()
calls the native function T2FIPSVersion

Returns:
return value from jni T2FIPSVersion - Version number of T2 FIPS build

doEncryptUsingT2Crypto

public java.lang.String doEncryptUsingT2Crypto(java.lang.String pin,
                                               java.lang.String plainText)
Encrypts a string using a pin/password Is dependent on T2Crypto being initialized! Requires that masterKey is set up

Parameters:
pin - Pin to use
plainText - Text to encrypt
Returns:
return encrypted version of plainText

doEncryptRaw

public java.lang.String doEncryptRaw(java.lang.String pin,
                                     java.lang.String plainText)
Encrypts a string using a pin/password Is NOT dependent on T2Crypto being initialized!

Parameters:
pin - Pin to use
plainText - Text to encrypt
Returns:
return encrypted version of plainText

Parameters:
pin - Pin to use
cipherText - Text to decrypt
Returns:
return encrypted version of cipherText

putString

static void putString(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String value)
Saves value to NVM using key This routine MUST be here for the native code to call for NVM storage NOTE: the native code MUST do encryption/decryption on all keys and values before calling this routine.

Parameters:
key - Key to use for value
value - Value to save to NVM

static java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)

Parameters:
key - Key to use for value
Returns:
Retrieved value

public static byte[] getPackageBasedSalt()
Returns a 8 byte salt for native t2Crypto to use with encryption
